name: Ivana
description: '''Vanya Todorova Kaludova''' ({{langx|bg|Ваня Тодорова Калудова}}; born 31 January 1969), known professionally as '''Ivana''' ({{Langx|bg|Ивана}}), is a popular [[Bulgaria]]n singer. She is one of the most prolific performers in the [[Chalga|pop-folk]] music genre in Bulgaria.
